artist: Artist: Himali Singh Soin; Artist: David Soin Tappeser; Producer: Forma
creditline: The Susan Jacobsen Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: color photographs on cardboard sleeve, on recto: walking person wearing a reflective thermal blanket, near shoreline; on verso: iceberg in water seen through a porthole; text in white at top [Side A, We Are Opposite Like That: I. Portals, II. Erratics, III. Transfigurations, IV. Emergences, V. Afterlives; Side B, Subcontinentment, I. South Asian Futurism, II. Rest, III. The Too-muchness of Life, IV. Indirect Vision, V. Pleasure, even at the end]
medium: Vinyl record album with cardboard sleeve
title: We Are Opposite Like That: Music and Poetry from the Polar Circles
